name: SOLEZOL
treatmentDescriptions: Solezol is indicated in adult for:                                                    :• Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) in patients with esophagitis and/or severe symptoms of reflux as an alternative to oral therapy when oral intake is not appropriate.  • Prevention of rebleeding following therapeutic endoscopy for acute bleeding gastric or duodenal ulcers.                                                                                                                          Solezol is indicated in children and adolescents aged 1-18 years for: • Gastric antisecretory treatment when the oral route is not possible, such as:                    gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) in patients with erosive reflux esophagitis and/or severe symptoms of reflux.
